sentences.sContent: galleries with an eclectic range of styles and artists
sentences.sCn: 收藏各个流派和艺术家作品的美术馆

sentences.sContent: an eclectic mixture of 18th and 19th century furniture
sentences.sCn: 兼有18和19世纪风格的家具

synos.tran: 折衷的；选择的；折衷学派的

trans.tranCn: 折中的； 博采众长的
trans.tranOther: including a mixture of many different things or people, especially so that you can use the best of all of them
